reviewText: Great film, the kongfu parts are very well. Yuefei is a Chinese legend, his childhood story is fresh. The actor must know kongfu.

I watched this movie at International Film Festival last week in Hollywood.  The movie starts kind of slow with the adults posturing for power.  When the real story starts with the kids learning the martial arts, it is terrific.  During the last half of the movie, kids in the audience laughed nonstop.  Both adults and children will like this movie.  The martial arts choreography is outstanding and fun to watch.
